Question.Subject: How do I delete a song from an Itunes playlist but keep it in the library?
Question.Content: I was just transfering some new purchases to playlists on Itunes and I accidentally put it in the wrong place. I tried to uncheck it in that list but when I do it unchecks in the play list that I want it in as well.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Delete the song from the playlist, iTunes will ask you if you want to delete it from you library, click no. (make a back up copy of the song just in case.)

Answer.Content: Delete the song from the playlist, iTunes will ask you if you want to delete it from you library, click no. (make a back up copy of the song just in case.)
